name: DarkEyes
description:
Game Jam GMTK - Doing more with less;

When attacking you also jump. But be careful.. When you attack your swords starts to erode and will deal less damage...

On the upside, when performing a successful hit, your sword will repair and deal more damage.

This game supports an Xbox controller.

Resources used: Unity 3D, Entitas,  Sonniss.com - GDC 2017 - Game Audio Bundle, Custom framework for math in Unity.
